dmca.title: DMCA notice to Google, Inc.
dmca.principal_name: BKM Film Besiktas Kültür Merkezi A.S.

works.description:
Dear madam, dear sir,

we have found several files infringing the copyright of our client BKM
Film 
Besiktas Kültür Merkezi on your servers, on whose behalf we are acting.

We are in good faith belief that use of the aforementioned material is not

authorized by the copyright owner, its agents, or the law.
I declare this information is accurate, under penalty of perjury.

The following files infringe our clients copyright on the turkish movie 
Cebimde Kelimeler, please remove those as soon as possible.
